overview: When Damon Matt and his children end up unconscious at a mysterious house, Damon decides to investigate. And to his horror, he found a dead body. After Agent Smithy gets a Disturbing call from Damon, both of them have to solve the murder of a 12 year old child. And there might be something even more sinister behind the killing.
tagline: The Most Murderous time of year
title: The Holiday Murder
